title: Go back to alarm manager for managing widget updates
message:
Go back to alarm manager for managing widget updates

Apparently the system can't be trusted to kill the
service gracefully, so we get stuck in limbo occasionally
Also due to the way Alarm manager handles batches we
can't guarantee RTC alarms wont be called when screen is
off (and triggering the handler)
So just use alarm manager to schedule all the updates
not really what i wanted but at least will guarantee
we wont miss any updates

title: Get preferences sorted out
message:
Get preferences sorted out

* fixup preference handling. can choose size/color
  for dream and each widget
* add back widget service to avoid excessive disk reads from
  preferences
* settings now has a 'tips' overlay to compensate for lack
  of vertical space in landscape hiding views if we put
  the tips in the main layout (also the overlay is cooler)
* fix tapas build after adding hugo
* fix dream text running off screen sometimes by forcing
  recalc when text changes
* lots of cleanup
* updates
